common_cold.name: Common Cold
common_cold.explanation: The common cold is caused by viral infection. Your symptoms indicate inflammation of the respiratory tract. Rest, fluids, and over-the-counter medications can help manage symptoms.

flu.name: Influenza (Flu)
flu.explanation: Flu is a viral infection affecting respiratory system. Your symptoms suggest potential influenza. Seek medical attention, especially if fever persists over 3 days.

covid_19.name: COVID-19
covid_19.explanation: COVID-19 symptoms include respiratory and systemic signs. Your symptom combination is consistent with COVID-19. Get tested and consult healthcare provider immediately.

allergies.name: Allergies
allergies.explanation: Allergic reaction causes inflammation of nasal passages and airways. Your symptoms suggest environmental or seasonal allergies. Antihistamines and avoiding triggers may help.

asthma.name: Asthma
asthma.explanation: Asthma involves airway inflammation and constriction. Your symptoms indicate potential asthma. Consult a pulmonologist for diagnosis and inhalers.

bronchitis.name: Bronchitis
bronchitis.explanation: Bronchitis involves inflammation of bronchial tubes. Your symptoms indicate airway inflammation. Allow time for recovery with rest and cough management.

pneumonia.name: Pneumonia
pneumonia.explanation: Pneumonia is lung tissue inflammation from bacterial or viral infection. Your symptoms suggest pneumonia. Seek immediate medical attention for diagnosis and treatment.

migraine.name: Migraine
migraine.explanation: Migraines involve vascular changes in the brain. Your symptoms indicate a migraine episode. Find quiet dark space and consider prescribed migraine medications.

hypertension.name: High Blood Pressure
hypertension.explanation: Hypertension strains the cardiovascular system. Your symptoms may indicate elevated blood pressure. Monitor BP regularly and consult a cardiologist.

diabetes.name: Diabetes
diabetes.explanation: Diabetes affects blood sugar metabolism. Your symptoms suggest possible diabetes. Get blood glucose testing done by healthcare provider immediately.

gastroenteritis.name: Gastroenteritis
gastroenteritis.explanation: Gastroenteritis is stomach and intestinal inflammation. Your symptoms indicate GI infection. Stay hydrated and rest; seek medical help if symptoms worsen.

urinary_tract_infection.name: Urinary Tract Infection
urinary_tract_infection.explanation: UTI is bacterial infection of urinary system. Your symptoms indicate UTI. Antibiotics prescribed by doctor are necessary for treatment.

anxiety.name: Anxiety Disorder
anxiety.explanation: Anxiety involves nervous system hyperactivity. Your symptoms suggest anxiety symptoms. Consider relaxation techniques and consult mental health professional.

depression.name: Depression
depression.explanation: Depression affects mood and motivation. Your symptoms indicate depressive signs. Professional mental health support and therapy are recommended.

dermatitis.name: Dermatitis
dermatitis.explanation: Dermatitis is skin inflammation from allergic or irritant response. Your symptoms indicate skin condition. Use gentle skincare and avoid irritants.

thyroiditis.name: Thyroid Inflammation
thyroiditis.explanation: Thyroid dysfunction affects metabolism. Your symptoms may indicate thyroid issues. Get thyroid function tests done by endocrinologist.
